verses.text: Now when \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* had \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*, and when he had \w confessed|strong="H3034"\w*, \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* and casting himself \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, there \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* unto him out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w* and \w children|strong="H3206"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w very|strong="H7235"\w* \w sore|strong="H1059"\w*.\f + \fr 10.1 \ft wept…: Heb. wept a great weeping\f*

And \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \add one\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*, We have \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and have \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: yet now there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H4723"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* concerning this thing.

Now therefore let us \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to put \w away|strong="H3318"\w* all the \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and such as are \w born|strong="H3205"\w* of them, according to the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0136"\w*, and of those that \w tremble|strong="H2730"\w* at the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and let it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft to put…: Heb. to bring forth\f*

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*; for \add this\add* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \add belongeth\add* unto thee: we also \add will be\add* with thee: be of good \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

Then \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*, and made the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* that they should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*. And they \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*.

¶ Then \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of \w Johanan|strong="H3076"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*: and \add when\add* he \w came|strong="H3212"\w* thither, he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: for he \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* because of the \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w* of them that had been carried \w away|strong="H1473"\w*.

And they made \w proclamation|strong="H5674"\w* throughout \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, that they should gather themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

And that whosoever would not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, according to the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, all his \w substance|strong="H7399"\w* should be \w forfeited|strong="H2763"\w*, and himself \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* from the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of those that had been carried \w away|strong="H1473"\w*.\f + \fr 10.8 \ft forfeited: Heb. devoted\f*

¶ Then all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. It \add was\add* the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, on the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*; and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w* because of \add this\add* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, and for the great \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*.\f + \fr 10.9 \ft the great…: Heb. the showers\f*

And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye have \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w*, and have \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, to \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* the \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 10.10 \ft have taken: Heb. have caused to dwell, or, have brought back\f*

Now therefore \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w confession|strong="H8426"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w pleasure|strong="H7522"\w*: and \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* yourselves from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and from the \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.

Then all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, As thou hast \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, so must we \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0061"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and \add it is\add* a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of much \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, and we are not \w able|strong="H3581"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, neither \add is this\add* a \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* or \w two|strong="H8147"\w*: for we are \w many|strong="H7235"\w* that have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* in this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft we are many…: or, we have greatly offended in this thing\f*

Let now our \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, and let all them which have \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* in our \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* at \w appointed|strong="H2163"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*, and with them the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* thereof, until the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for this \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* be \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* from us.\f + \fr 10.14 \ft for this…: or, till this matter be dispatched\f*

¶ Only \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* and \w Jahaziah|strong="H3167"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tikvah|strong="H8616"\w* were \w employed|strong="H5975"\w* about this \add matter:\add* and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* and \w Shabbethai|strong="H7678"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* them.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft were…: Heb. stood\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*. And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \add with\add* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and all of them by \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, were \w separated|strong="H0914"\w*, and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* to \w examine|strong="H1875"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

And they made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* with all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that had \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* by the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

¶ And among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* there were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* that had \w taken|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*: \add namely\add*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*; \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, and \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*, and \w Jarib|strong="H3402"\w*, and \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*.

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* that they would put \w away|strong="H3318"\w* their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*; and \add being\add* \w guilty|strong="H0818"\w*, \add they offered\add* a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* for their \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w*.
And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w*; \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, and \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*; \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, and \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*; \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*, \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, and \w Elasah|strong="H0501"\w*.

Also of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, and \w Kelaiah|strong="H7041"\w*, (the same \add is\add* \w Kelita|strong="H7042"\w*,) \w Pethahiah|strong="H6611"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*.

Of the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* also; \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*: and of the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*; \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, and \w Telem|strong="H2928"\w*, and \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*.

Moreover of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Parosh|strong="H6551"\w*; \w Ramiah|strong="H7422"\w*, and \w Jeziah|strong="H3150"\w*, and \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Miamin|strong="H4326"\w*, and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*; \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Abdi|strong="H5660"\w*, and \w Jeremoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Eliah|strong="H0452"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zattu|strong="H2240"\w*; \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*, \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, and \w Jeremoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w*, and \w Aziza|strong="H5819"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Bebai|strong="H0893"\w*; \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Zabbai|strong="H2140"\w*, \add and\add* \w Athlai|strong="H6270"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*; \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, \w Malluch|strong="H4409"\w*, and \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*, \w Jashub|strong="H3437"\w*, and \w Sheal|strong="H7594"\w*, and \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pahath-moab|strong="H6355"\w*; \w Adna|strong="H5733"\w*, and \w Chelal|strong="H3636"\w*, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w*, and \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*, and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

And \add of\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*; \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*, \w Ishijah|strong="H3449"\w*, \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Shimeon|strong="H8095"\w*,
\w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Malluch|strong="H4409"\w*, \add and\add* \w Shemariah|strong="H8114"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashum|strong="H2828"\w*; \w Mattenai|strong="H4982"\w*, \w Mattathah|strong="H4992"\w*, \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w*, \w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w*, \w Jeremai|strong="H3413"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \add and\add* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.
Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*; \w Maadai|strong="H4572"\w*, \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, and \w Uel|strong="H0177"\w*,
\w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w Bedeiah|strong="H0912"\w*, \w Chelluh|strong="H3622"\w*,
\w Vaniah|strong="H2057"\w*, \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w*, \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*,
\w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w Mattenai|strong="H4982"\w*, and \w Jaasau|strong="H3299"\w*,
And \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, and \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*,
And \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*,
\w Machnadebai|strong="H4367"\w*, \w Shashai|strong="H8343"\w*, \w Sharai|strong="H8298"\w*,\f + \fr 10.40 \ft Machnadebai: or, Mabnadebai, according to some copies\f*
\w Azareel|strong="H5832"\w*, and \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, \w Shemariah|strong="H8114"\w*,
\w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, \add and\add* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*; \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w*, \w Zebina|strong="H2081"\w*, \w Jadau|strong="H3035"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*.

All these had \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*: and \add some\add* of them \w had|strong="H3426"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* by whom they \w had|strong="H7760"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.
